Name: During the process of creating a product notification, you can choose to enter the ingredient information manually - using the forms provided - or by uploading the ingredients using a CSV file.

If you have added ingredient information by using a CSV file, you can still edit the ingredients manually or add and remove ingredients manually while the notification is in a draft status. To edit the ingredient information, begin the same task again and choose to enter ingredients manually.
This upload functionality can be useful when tasked with creating several notifications which all include a common set of ingredients.
